amendment.description: Page 260, line 1, after the dollar amount, insert "(increased by $10,000,000) (reduced by $10,000,000)".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 91 printed in House Report 115-297 to provide funding for the NOAA Environmental Security Computing Center to support an increase in electrical capacity and completion of the build out.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A103) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A103) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A103) offered by Mr. McKinley.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
